Collection 01

The Originals

The original @Bstract collection – 151 abstract canvas paintings that have been digitised and released as 1/1 NFTs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt.

The remaining Originals are avialable to buy via the OpenSea collection.
